question: Hi this is Vamshi My dad is a diabetic patient, he is of 54 yrs old. His diabetic percentage per lunch is 210,post lunch is 435. How to control this % of diabetes? What is the Dite? Can he eat oats? what % we should maintain? What is  the dangerous % level ( low & high%). Is it necessary to go for injections or can we control with tablets.Please help me with the details.
title: Diabetic percentage level
